name: Decipher Quest
description:
The whole game was made during the Ludum Dare 32 in 48 hours by me.

Tip 1:
Memorize the ciphers when letter to pigpen.

Tip 2:
The latin alphabet has an order. The pigpen ciphers have the same order.

Tip 3:
The cipher is also used in the mainmenu and the gameover screen.

Help (only if you can't beat it):
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pigpen_cipher

Have fun!
